datasetStructure: One record per device identifier per device

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined identifier for the device. It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, combination of identifiers).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.DISEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a parameter within a device (SPDEVID) within dataset. If there is only one value for DIPARMCD for each value of SPDEVID, then DISEQ will be 1 for all records. DISEQ must be a valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DISEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.DIPARMCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the identifier characteristic of the device (e.g., "SERIAL", "MODEL"). A record with DIPARMCD = "DEVTYPE" should be included (see below).
datasetVariables.label: Device Identifier Element Short Name
datasetVariables.name: DIPARMCD

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.DIPARM

datasetVariables.description: Name of the identifier characteristic of the device. Examples: Serial Number, Model. A record with DIPARM = "DEVTYPE" should be included (see below).
datasetVariables.label: Device Identifier Element Name
datasetVariables.name: DIPARM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DI.DIVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value for the parameter. Value for the parameter. When DIPARMCD=DEVTYPE it should use controlled terminology defined by FDA in their Preferred Term codelist. FDA has stated a preference for the Global Medical Device Nomenclature (GMDN), but as of the date of this publication, the GMDN is not freely available to the public. In its Unique Device Identification rule, FDA indicated that GMDN will not be required unless it is available to the public at no cost. There is a lookup tool on the FDA website to map GMDN codes to FDA PT codes.
datasetVariables.label: Device Identifier Element Value
datasetVariables.name: DIVAL

description: A special-purpose domain containing information that identifies a specific device unit. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102618, 2018-06-29)
label: Device Identifiers
name: DI
